UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Tachyplesin and CyLoP-1 as efficient anti-mycobacterial peptides: A novel finding.
Literature.Author: Priya A, Aditya A, Budagavi DB, Chugh A

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium smegmatis(MIC=10-20µM),Mycobacterium smegmatis(MBC=10-20µM),Mycobacterium fortuitum(MIC=>20µM),Mycobacterium fortuitum(MBC=>20µM),Mycobacterium wolinskyi(MIC=20µM),Mycobacterium wolinskyi(MBC=>20µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(50-60% Cytotoxicity=113.1µM)
